# formal_space (Data Source)

Data source for looking up a Space by ID or by name. Use either `id` or `name`, but not both.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The Formal ID for this Space.
- `name` (String) The name of the Space to look up. Use this to fetch a space by name.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (Number) Creation time of the Space.
- `description` (String) Description of the Space.
- `termination_protection` (Boolean) If set to true, this Space cannot be deleted.
